    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck_of_Fortune

        public Deck_of_Fortune()
        Default constructor. Initializes the array of card objects , and the sets each card number and their corresponding card value.

    • Method Detail

      • pickCard

        public Card pickCard()
        Picks a card from the top of the deck, pushes the other cards up and then it places the card on the bottom of the deck. The card number does not change since it is an attribute of the card object and it has nothing to do with the index of the array
        Returns:
        card that has been picked up(copy of the original card, will be used to get the value of the card)

      • getDeck

        public Card[] getDeck()
        Returns a copy of the deck (Not used in program but useful)
        Returns:

      • getCard

        public Card getCard(int i)
        Parameters:
        i - index position
        Returns:
        card value

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        This method shuffles the deck.

      • swap

        private void swap(int pos1,
        int pos2)
        Swaps two cards, useful for shuffling the deck
        Parameters:
        pos1 - is the index of the first card
        pos2 - is the index of the second card
